value:
Pair Up
By tapping the Switch button, you can
change to the unit's Pair Up partner.

Ranulf's favorite headband. Crafted
from thick fabric, it protects the
wearer's head quite well.

This version of Ranulf's headband has
very convincing fakes of his ears
attached.

Lethe's green ribbon. The bells sewn
to it create a lovely sound when the
wearer moves.

Lethe's green ribbon. The ears that
are attached to it look surprisingly
realistic.

Squirrels that made friends with
Mordecai. They cavort upon him
as he naps in the forest.

Ducks attracted by Mordecai's gentle
character. They approached of their
own accord.

A headpiece bestowed by Caineghis.
It's modeled on the royal insignia,
and is quite heavy.

A headpiece bestowed by Caineghis.
This shining symbol of the Lion King
is said to grant strength to its wearer.

Defeat an enemy that is level 20 or higher with
Raven.

Defeat an enemy that is level 20 or higher with
Leon.

Defeat an enemy that is level 20 or higher with
Eliwood: Knight of Lycia.

Defeat an enemy that is level 35 or higher with
Raven.

Defeat an enemy that is level 35 or higher with
Leon.

Defeat an enemy that is level 35 or higher with
Eliwood: Knight of Lycia.
Clear the second stratum of the Training Tower.
Clear the eighth stratum of the Training Tower.
Win Arena Duels on any difficulty.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Ephraim &
Myrrh with Alfonse: Prince of Askr on your
team.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Ephraim &
Myrrh on Lunatic or higher difficulty with Anna
on your team.

Defeat Myrrh: Great Dragon at level 40
or higher with Alfonse: Prince of Askr.

Defeat Ephraim: Restoration Lord at level 40
or higher with Anna.

Clear the Bound Hero Battle against Ephraim &
Myrrh on Lunatic or higher difficulty using an
all-armored team.

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 1 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. All
four allies must survive. (Allies deployed as
cohorts do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 2 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. All
four allies must survive. (Allies deployed as
cohorts do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 3 on Lunatic
difficulty with a lance ally on your team. All
four allies must survive. (Allies deployed as
cohorts do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 4 on Lunatic
difficulty with an axe ally on your team. All
four allies must survive. (Allies deployed as
cohorts do not count.)

Clear Book III, Chapter 6: Part 5 on Lunatic
difficulty with a sword ally on your team. All
four allies must survive. (Allies deployed as
cohorts do not count.)

A cat warrior from Gallia, the home of the beast
tribe of laguz. Though young, his king trusts him
deeply. Considered the right hand of the future
king. Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

A cat warrior from Gallia, the home of the beast
tribe of laguz. Once had a distrust of all beorc,
but that's slowly changing. Appears in Fire
Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

A tiger warrior from Gallia, the home of the
beast tribe of laguz. A kind, peace-loving giant.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

The lion ruler of Gallia, the home of the beast
tribe of laguz. Uses his wisdom and courage to
seek a path toward peace with the beorc.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

A dracoknight and former Daein soldier.
Naturally talented, but lazy. Often napping.
Appears in Fire Emblem: Radiant Dawn.

During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Def
by number of allies within 2 spaces × 2.
(Maximum bonus of +6 to each stat.)

During combat, boosts unit's Atk/Def
by number of allies within 2 spaces × 2.
(Maximum bonus of +6 to each stat.)

If cavalry allies within 2 spaces use sword,
lance, or axe and unit initiates combat, unit
attacks twice.

At start of combat, if unit's HP < 100%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat.

Grants Def+3. If a movement Assist skill (like
Reposition, Shove, Pivot, etc.) is used by unit
or targets unit, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-4 on
foes within 2 spaces of unit and target through
their next actions after movement. At start of
turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon
allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2 and deals +10
damage when Special triggers.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

Grants Atk+3. If foe initiates combat, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 during combat. At start of
turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon
allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2, and unit can
counterattack regardless of foe's range.

Grants Def+3. If unit is within 2 spaces of an
ally, grants Atk/Def+3 to unit and allies within
2 spaces of unit during combat. At start of turn,
if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon allies
or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates
combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during
combat and foe cannot make a follow-up
attack.

Grants Spd+3. If unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Spd+6 during combat. At start of
turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast or dragon
allies or if unit is not adjacent to any ally, unit
transforms (otherwise, unit reverts). If unit
transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit initiates
combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe during combat
and foe cannot make a follow-up attack.
Grants Atk/Def+6 to target ally for 1 turn.

If foe initiates combat and uses bow, dagger,
magic, or staff, grants Def/Res+8 and
neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like
Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Def+2 during combat.

If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Def+4 during combat.

If unit is not adjacent to an ally, grants
Spd/Def+6 during combat.

While unit lives and uses beast damage, unit
gets 1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied.
Does not stack.)

While unit lives, all beast allies on team get
1.5x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)

While unit lives, all beast allies on team get
2x EXP. (Only highest value applied. Does
not stack.)
